alert.note: Alert for Concordia; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:43PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Tensas and northeastern Concordia Parishes, southwestern Jefferson and northeastern Adams Counties through 430 PM CST... At 342 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vidalia, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Natchez and Vidalia around 355 PM CST. Spokane around 405 PM CST. Stanton around 420 PM CST. Church Hill around 430 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ridgecrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for southwestern Mississippi.
